price: Respondió: "Pediré a mi Señor que los perdone, Él es el Absolvedor, el Misericordioso".
arabic: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
